1017.issue: [E1017] Licenses in [package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.opensmartcity/blob/master/package.json) and in [io-package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.opensmartcity/blob/master/io-package.json) are different

1026.issue: [E1026] Missing mandatory translation into de of "common.titleLang" in [io-package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.opensmartcity/blob/master/io-package.json).

1027.issue: [W1027] Missing suggested translation into ru,pt,nl,fr,it,es,pl,uk,zh-cn of "common.titleLang" in [io-package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.opensmartcity/blob/master/io-package.json).

1057.issue: [E1057] js-controller 5 listed as dependency but 5.0.19 is required as minimum, 6.0.11 is recommended. Please update dependency at [io-package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.opensmartcity/blob/master/io-package.json).

1074.issue: [W1074] Potential sensitive data "password" not listed at "encryptedNative" in [io-package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.opensmartcity/blob/master/io-package.json)

1081.issue: [W1081] "common.license" in [io-package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.opensmartcity/blob/master/io-package.json) is deprecated. Please define object "common.licenseInformation"

1082.issue: [E1082] Please remove "common.license" from [io-package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.opensmartcity/blob/master/io-package.json) as "common.licenseInformation" is declared.

1084.issue: [W1084] "common.title" is deprecated and replaced by "common.titleLang". Please remove from [io-package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.opensmartcity/blob/master/io-package.json).

4036.issue: [S4036] Consider adding .vscode/settings.json file with JSON schema definitions for better development experience with Visual Studio Code.

5023.issue: [S5023] "package-lock.json" not found in repo! Please consider to commit it to github repository.

8002.issue: [E8002] No topics found in the repository. Please go to "https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.opensmartcity", press the settings button beside the about title and add some topics.

8004.issue: [W8004] Please process issue [[#49] "Migration to ESLint 9 and @iobroker/eslint-config"](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.opensmartcity/issues/49)

9006.issue: [S9006] .commitinfo file should be excluded by .gitignore, please add a line with text ".commitinfo" to .gitignore

0029.issue: [E0029] Node.js 18 is required as minimum, node.js 20 is recommended. Please change "{'engines' : { 'node' >= '16' } }" to "{'engines' : { 'node' >= '18' } }" at [package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.opensmartcity/blob/master/package.json).

0033.issue: [E0033] @iobroker/adapter-core 3.0.4 specified. 3.2.3 is required as minimum, 3.3.2 (or newer) is current. Please update dependencies at [package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.opensmartcity/blob/master/package.json)

0035.issue: [E0035] No devDependency declared for @iobroker/testing. Please add "@iobroker/testing":"5.2.2" to devDependencies at [package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.opensmartcity/blob/master/package.json)

0036.issue: [E0036] @alcalzone/release-script-plugin-iobroker 3.7.0 specified. 3.7.2 is required as minimum,  4.0.0 (or newer) is current. Please update devDependencies at [package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.opensmartcity/blob/master/package.json)

0037.issue: [W0037] @alcalzone/release-script-plugin-license 3.7.0 specified. 4.0.0 (or newer) is current. Please update devDependencies at [package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.opensmartcity/blob/master/package.json)
